          <title>
            <string language="es">La Razón Áurea: Interpretación geométrica y analítica</string>
            <string language="en">The golden ratio: geometrical and analytical interpretations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das goldene Verhältnis: geometrische und 
analytische Deutungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le taux d'or : traductions géométriques 
et analytiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A relação dourada: interpretações 
geométricas e analíticas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il rapporto dorato: interpretazioni 
geometriche ed analitiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η χρυσή αναλογία: γεωμετρικές και αναλυτικές 
ερμηνείες</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">simulación interactiva que permite aproximarse a la razón aúrea mediante la secuencia de los números de Fibonacci</string>
            <string language="en">interactive simulation which uses the sequence of Fibonacci numbers to introduce the golden ratio</string>
          </description>

            <string language="es">razón áurea</string>
            <string language="en">golden ratio</string>
